intro: Guide unique little dragons using only three buttons as they run around. Dive into a pixel-art 2.5D action adventure that bends the rules of dimension!
description:
Fiz and the Rainbow Planet is a 2.5D pixel-art action game where you switch between characters as the situation demands to overcome challenges. One of the game’s standout features is the “Dimensional Sanctuary” , which offers a unique experience of progressing through a three-dimensional space while maintaining the look and feel of classic 2D gameplay. 


Story

Somewhere in the vast universe lies Planet Longa. One night, a young dragon named Fiz had a disturbing dream. The world had turned gray, and all life stood still, frozen in time. It was a terrifying vision of a lifeless future. When Fiz wakes up, he is visited by Taonga, a mysterious and all-knowing dragon, who reveals that the dream was more than just a nightmare. It was a glimpse of a possible future. To prevent this grim fate, Fiz must join forces with Taonga and five other dragons. Together, the seven must protect the sacred orbs scattered across the world. Determined to save his world, Fiz sets off on a grand adventure to find his companions and change the future.
